meanings.definition: A line on a map or chart connecting points having the same temperature.
meanings.sent1: The isotherm on the map shows where the temperature is the same.
meanings.sent2: Meteorologists use isotherms to understand temperature patterns across regions.
meanings.sent3: The isotherm decided to take a break from connecting points and went on a vacation.
meanings.sent4: The isotherm acted like a colorful thread weaving through the map.
meanings.sent5: The isotherm painted a clear picture of temperature consistency on the chart.
